site.name: BlancPage Solutions
site.tagline: Start fresh with innovative solutions tailored to your business needs

hero.title: Welcome to BlancPage Solutions
hero.subtitle: I help businesses unlock the power of their data with innovative BI and development solutions

about.title: About Me
about.description: I believe every great achievement starts with a blank page. Through BlancPage Solutions, I help you write your success story with cutting-edge data and development solutions that drive real business value.

profile.title: I'm Dave
profile.name: David LeBlanc
profile.bio: With over a decade of experience in technology and business intelligence, I specialize in transforming complex data into actionable insights. I'm passionate about helping businesses make data-driven decisions and building scalable solutions that drive growth.

services.title: Business Intelligence
services.description: I design and implement BI solutions that transform raw data into strategic insights for better decision making

projects.title: Healthcare Analytics Dashboard
projects.businessContext: Regional hospital system needed real-time visibility into patient flow, bed utilization, and operational metrics to improve efficiency and patient care
projects.outcome: Reduced patient wait times by 30%, improved bed utilization by 15%, and provided executives with real-time operational dashboards

projects.title: Financial Services KPI Platform
projects.businessContext: Credit union required comprehensive executive dashboards to track loan performance, member growth, and regulatory compliance metrics
projects.outcome: Automated monthly reporting process, reduced report generation time by 80%, and improved regulatory compliance tracking

services.title: Data Engineering
services.description: I build robust data pipelines and architectures that ensure your data is clean, accessible, and scalable

projects.title: Real-time Data Pipeline Architecture
projects.businessContext: Growing e-commerce platform needed to process millions of daily transactions and customer interactions for real-time personalization
projects.outcome: Built scalable data pipeline processing 2M+ events daily with 99.9% uptime, enabling real-time product recommendations

projects.title: Legacy Data Migration & Modernization
projects.businessContext: Manufacturing company needed to migrate 20+ years of legacy data to cloud platform while maintaining operations
projects.outcome: Successfully migrated 50TB of historical data with zero downtime, improved query performance by 75%

services.title: Solution Architecture
services.description: I design comprehensive technical solutions that align with your business goals and scale with your growth

projects.title: Multi-Cloud Infrastructure Design
projects.businessContext: Fast-growing SaaS startup needed scalable, resilient infrastructure to support 10x user growth while maintaining security compliance
projects.outcome: Designed auto-scaling architecture supporting 500K+ users, achieved 99.95% uptime with 50% cost optimization

projects.title: Enterprise Security & Compliance Framework
projects.businessContext: Government agency required secure cloud architecture meeting FedRAMP compliance standards for citizen services platform
projects.outcome: Delivered FedRAMP-compliant infrastructure with automated security monitoring and incident response capabilities

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: I develop end-to-end applications from database to user interface, delivering complete technical solutions

projects.title: Customer Portal Application
projects.businessContext: Consulting firm needed client-facing portal for project tracking, document sharing, and billing transparency
projects.outcome: Increased client satisfaction scores by 40%, reduced support tickets by 60%, streamlined project communication

projects.title: Internal Operations Platform
projects.businessContext: Regional retailer needed unified platform for inventory management, sales tracking, and employee scheduling across 25 locations
projects.outcome: Reduced inventory discrepancies by 85%, improved scheduling efficiency by 45%, unified operations across all locations

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you soon.
